sentence.text: Mutations in double-strand break repair via homologous recombination are implicated in cancer development and in a severe congenital inflammatory disease known as Aicardi-Goutieres syndrome.

entity.text: double-strand break repair via homologous recombination

sentence.text: The mechanism by which double-strand break repair via homologous recombination protects against cancer and chronic inflammation is unknown.

entity.text: double-strand break repair via homologous recombination
